text: Kinta ye khomje paya na, tabe eke-aparake sparsa karara purbe parapara du'i masa roya rakha. Kinta ye sakti rakhe na, taâ€™hale satajana abhabagrastake kha'oyano. E ejan'ya ye tomara yena allah o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kara, ara egulo hacche allahâ€Œra bidhi-nisedha. Ara abisbasidera jan'ya rayeche marmantuda sasti.
